Body:
binom = Binomial(rand=None, n=10, p=0.05, xlim=(0, 10), N=7)
x, y = binom.data
for i, j in zip(x, [0, 1, 3, 5, 6, 8, 10]):
    assert abs(i - j) < TOLERANCE
for i, j in zip(y, [0.598736939, 0.315124705, 0.0104750594, 6.09352488e-05,
    2.67259863e-06, 1.58642578e-09, 9.765625e-14]):
    assert abs(i - j) < TOLERANCE
